questionnaire.title: Questionnaire Identifying Restoration Objective & Goals
questionnaire.max_treecover: Maximum allowable percent tree cover in {}:

compute.title: Launch computation
compute.desc: **The launch button will be available after you check the input data in order to avoid wrong computations**

constraints.title: Constraints
constraints.desc: Select constraints from the dropdown menu below to add a limitation to consider. For each constraint, choose values greater than or less than a particular value. Note that some constraint are scaled differntly so please read their short description after selection to assign appropriate values.

custom.title: Customize layers input
custom.desc: by clicking on the 'apply questionnaire button, the different layers will be wheighted to best meet your answers. The User still have liberty of changing the value of any weight. In the second Panel The user will find all the layer that can be changed with custom one.Be extra careful wile changing the wheigth and using custom layer as it can lead to wrong or inacurate recommandations

dial.change: change layer used for the computation
dial.disc: You need to select a layer before making modifications

potential.title: Restoration potential and land use
potential.desc: Max % tree cover in land use classes
